column4: This is going to sound random, but does anyone else use a 1920x1200 monitor and perhaps have a decent 1920x1200 gdm theme?
b) your virus scanner is most likely showing a false positive.
more than likely, if you are scanning a .deb file.
I didn't say "never" I said highly unlikely
and that a w32 virus cannot infect a linux system
and don't tend to tunnel vnc, I just use ssh and the commandline, since I am perfectly happy with it.
the day the command line is taken away from ubuntu is the day I go to something else.
LjL: Will these tools also copy the MBR? I'm trying to migrate to a larger boot drive
why do you need to copy the MBR, you could always just reinstall grub on the new drives MBR
guess i don't know how to install GRUB outside of doing a full Linux Install
just follow those instructions from ubotu
